title: CanonFile
description: A collection of canonical material tied to a particular time, place, or release

user.description: The username that owns the document and may edit it.

version.description: The iteration of the document. Every edit increases this by one.

title.description: The string to use when showing this item in menus and links.

kind.description: The category that this item belongs to.

children.description: A list of child document IDs. E.g. if this document is an album, the children are songs. The IDs here are relative - the path part is omitted.
